export default function SingleItemList({ value, addToCart }) { const formatPrice = (price) => { const numberPrice = parseFloat(price); // Convert to number if it's a string if (isNaN(numberPrice)) { return "N/A"; // Handle cases where the price is not a valid number } return numberPrice.toFixed(2); // Format to 2 decimal places }; return ( <>

{value.title}

â‚ª {formatPrice(value.price)}

); }
